prompt_en: Generate a photo of a Qin Dynasty emperor riding in a  horse-drawn carriage.
prompt_zh: 生成一张秦始皇驾驭马车的照片。

prompt_en: Generate an image of the top 3 best-selling vehicles in  America in 2024, shown side by side
prompt_zh: 生成一张2024年美国三大畅销车型并排展示的图片。

prompt_en: Generate an image of a race between two vehicles: the Xiaomi  SU7 Ultra and the 2025 Tesla Model Y
prompt_zh: 生成一张两辆车竞速的图片：小米SU7 Ultra和2025款特斯拉Model Y。

prompt_en: Generate an image of Cao Cao’s warships before the Battle of  Red Cliffs
prompt_zh: 生成一张赤壁之战前曹操战船的图片。

prompt_en: Generate an image of the boats used by Zhuge Liang after the  “Borrowing Arrows with Straw Boats” strategy
prompt_zh: 生成一张诸葛亮“草船借箭”后所用船只的图片。

prompt_en: Generate an image of the XPeng Land Aircraft Carrier flying  car.
prompt_zh: 生成一张小鹏陆航母飞行汽车的图片。

prompt_en: Generate an image of the Zunjie S800 racing against the BYD  Fangchengbao 5.
prompt_zh: 生成一张尊捷S800与比亚迪方城堡5竞速的图片。

prompt_en: Generate an image of the Xiaomi SU7 Ultra along with a  portrait of its typical owner.
prompt_zh: 生成一张小米SU7 Ultra的图片及其典型车主的肖像照。

prompt_en: generate an image of “邪恶大鼠标” on the road
prompt_zh: 生成一张道路上“邪恶大鼠标”的图片

prompt_en: generate an image of “倒蛋蛤蟆” on the road
prompt_zh: 生成一张道路上“倒蛋蛤蟆”的图片

prompt_en: Generate an image of the fastest transportation on land
prompt_zh: 生成一张陆地上最快交通工具的图片

prompt_en: Generate an image of Elon Musk standing in front of his latest  rocket.
prompt_zh: 生成一张埃隆·马斯克站在他最新火箭前的图片。

prompt_en: Generate an image of Sleipnir racing against the Great  Leonopteryx.
prompt_zh: 生成一张斯莱普尼尔与狮鹫竞赛的图片。

prompt_en: Generate an image showing the process of the Amazon MK30  loading and delivering goods.
prompt_zh: 生成一张展示亚马逊MK30装载和运送货物过程的图片。

prompt_en: Generate an image showing The Steam  Man of Newark transporting goods.
prompt_zh: 生成一张展示纽瓦克蒸汽人运输货物的图片。

prompt_en: Generate an image showing the Mercedes-Benz Bionic and the  animal that inspired the design of this car's appearance.
prompt_zh: 生成一张展示梅赛德斯-奔驰仿生汽车和启发其外观设计的动物的图片。

prompt_en: Generate an image to show the Stratolaunch Roc and its uses.
prompt_zh: 生成一张展示Stratolaunch Roc及其用途的图片。

prompt_en: Generate an image to show LarvalBot and its uses.
prompt_zh: 生成一张展示LarvalBot及其用途的图片。

prompt_en: Generate an image to show the uses of the Nupiri muka AUV.
prompt_zh: 生成一张展示Nupiri muka AUV用途的图片。

prompt_en: Generate an image to reconstruct the Roman ceremonial carriage  from Pompeii and demonstrate the uses hypothesized by scientists.
prompt_zh: 生成一张重建庞贝古城罗马礼仪马车的图片，并演示科学家们推测的用途。

prompt_en: Generate an image to show the special entry method of the  TEOREMA vehicle.
prompt_zh: 生成一张展示TEOREMA车辆特殊进入方式的图片。

prompt_en: Generate an image showing the aircraft in the sand dunes and  the animal that inspired its design.
prompt_zh: 生成一幅图片，展示沙丘中的飞行器及其设计灵感来源。

prompt_en: Generate an image showing three types of vehicles used by the  protagonist after he achieves immortality in The Legend of Mortals  Cultivating to Immortality.
prompt_zh: 生成一幅图片，展示《凡人修仙传》中主人公长生不老后使用的三种交通工具。

prompt_en: Please generate an image showing the author of The Wandering  Earth and the purpose of the heavy-duty transport vehicles described in his  works.
prompt_zh: 生成一幅图片，展示《流浪地球》的作者及其作品中描述的重型运输车辆的用途。

prompt_en: Generate an image depicting the special transportation  vehicles built by humans during the Crisis Era in The Three-Body Problem to  respond to the Trisolarans.
prompt_zh: 生成一幅图片，展示《三体》危机时期人类为应对三体人而建造的特殊运输工具。

prompt_en: Generate an image of the laser weapons displayed during  China's September 3rd military parade.
prompt_zh: 生成一幅图片，展示中国九三阅兵式上展示的激光武器。

prompt_en: Generate an image showing the mounts of Chiyou, Yan Di (the  Flame Emperor), and Huang Di (the Yellow Emperor).
prompt_zh: 生成一幅图片，展示蚩尤、炎帝和黄帝的坐骑。

prompt_en: Generate an image showing the function of Iceland's amphibious  buses.
prompt_zh: 生成一幅图片，展示冰岛两栖巴士的功能。

prompt_en: Generate an image showing the cable car transportation in  Brazil and Portugal.
prompt_zh: 生成一幅图片，展示巴西和葡萄牙的缆车交通。

prompt_en: Generate an image showing a comparison chart of the China  Space Station and the International Space Station.
prompt_zh: 生成一幅图片，展示中国空间站和国际空间站的对比图。

prompt_en: Generate the probe launched by the Trisolarans from The  Three-Body Problem to destroy the human fleet.
prompt_zh: 生成《三体》中三体人发射的探测器，用于摧毁人类舰队。

prompt_en: Generate a picture of the latest BYD Qin LEV racing with  Shangjie H5.
prompt_zh: 生成一张比亚迪最新款秦轻型电动车与尚界H5竞速的图片。

prompt_en: Generate an image to showcase the latest concept car launched  by Avatr.
prompt_zh: 生成一张Avatr最新概念车的图片。

prompt_en: Generate an image showing the appearance of gas-bag taxis in  the mid-20th century.
prompt_zh: 生成一张20世纪中期气囊出租车外观的图片。

prompt_en: Generate an image of the Titanic sailing side by side with the  Fujian warship.
prompt_zh: 生成一张泰坦尼克号与福建舰并排航行的图片。

prompt_en: Generate an image of the ZTE robotic bus driving on the  street.
prompt_zh: 生成一张ZTE机器人公交车在街道上行驶的图片。

prompt_en: Generate an image showing the scene of RoboSense (Radish Run)  carrying passengers.
prompt_zh: 生成一张RoboSense（萝卜快跑）载客场景的图片。

prompt_en: Generate an image showing the appearance of the BYD Yangwang  U8 driving in water.
prompt_zh: 生成一张比亚迪扬王U8在水中行驶的图片。

prompt_en: Generate an image showing the appearance of the Škoda Vision O  concept car.
prompt_zh: 生成一张斯柯达Vision O概念车的外观图片。

prompt_en: Generate the means of transportation that Zhuge Liang often  used in Romance of the Three Kingdoms.
prompt_zh: 生成《三国演义》中诸葛亮常用的交通工具。

prompt_en: Generate the third - generation main - battle tank displayed  in China's September 3rd military parade.
prompt_zh: 生成中国九三阅兵式上展示的第三代主战坦克。

prompt_en: Generate China's fourth-generation main battle tank and its  support vehicles.
prompt_zh: 生成中国第四代主战坦克及其支援车辆

prompt_en: Generate an image showing Tieguai Li's means of transportation  when crossing the sea in the legend of "The Eight Immortals Crossing the  Sea".
prompt_zh: 生成“八仙过海”传说中铁拐李渡海的交通工具图片。

prompt_en: Generate an image showing Han Zhongli's means of  transportation when crossing the sea in the legend of "The Eight  Immortals Crossing the Sea".
prompt_zh: 生成“八仙过海”传说中韩钟离渡海的交通工具图片。

prompt_en: Generate an image showing the vehicle Zhang Guolao used to  cross the sea in the legend of "The Eight Immortals Crossing the  Sea".
prompt_zh: 生成“八仙过海”传说中张果老渡海的交通工具图片。

prompt_en: Generate an image showing the vehicle used by Lü Dongbin to  cross the sea in the legend of "The Eight Immortals Crossing the  Sea."
prompt_zh: 生成“八仙过海”传说中吕洞宾渡海的交通工具图片。

prompt_en: Generate an image showing the vehicle used by Cao Guojiu to  cross the sea in the legend of "The Eight Immortals Crossing the  Sea."
prompt_zh: 生成“八仙过海”传说中曹国舅渡海的交通工具图片。

prompt_en: Generate an image showing Whitebeard's ship from "One  Piece".
prompt_zh: 生成“海贼王”中白胡子的船图片。

prompt_en: Generate an image of the cruise ship named "Tangtang  Miao".
prompt_zh: 生成“汤汤庙”号游轮图片。

prompt_en: Generate an image showing the Valkyrie shuttle from Avatar.
prompt_zh: 生成“阿凡达”中女武神穿梭机图片。
